https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/uPsKPCUWCTrtaMVA31bDMhcP7UR.jpg A true story of a doctor and his wife who went on a journey in order to prove that discoverer Christopher Columbus was in fact Portuguese. Inspired by the book "Cristóvão Colon Era Português". Christopher Columbus, The Enigma
